title: Got the wrong Capsule from Twitch Prime?
body:
Did anybody else get the wrong capsule from the Prime 4 rewards? 

I got a cat capsule which seemed odd before opening, but it gave me 3 975 skins in it. I didnt get the legendary skin or even the penguin emote from the Baron capsule as advertised.

replies.body: Got a response back from support stating the correct capsule should drop within 24 hours. No penalty for opening it.

> [{quoted}](name=Raileser,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=A2swmivN,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2019-08-26T21:44:36.701+0000)
>
> Got a response back from support stating the correct capsule should drop within 24 hours. No penalty for opening it.

Need this to get to the top
I got a cat capsule that contained a Doggie Bag which then gave me 17 skin shards for the entire pool party theme... So I'm both confused and not mad about it.
xd well dang nice
It seems that many people got the problem. I didn't see I got the wrong capsule and I open it too. I hope riot will fix this

> [{quoted}](name=Póppy Chulo,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=A2swmivN,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-08-26T18:32:03.136+0000)
>
> Did anybody else get the wrong capsule from the Prime 4 rewards? 
> 
> I got a cat capsule which seemed odd before opening, but it gave me 3 975 skins in it. I didnt get the legendary skin or even the penguin emote from the Baron capsule as advertised.

Hey Poppy, can you check the Twitch Prime Loot page and see if it's available now or at least awaiting redemption?
Hello! I just checked, shows claimed and I do not have the Baron capsule in my loot either.

> [{quoted}](name=Póppy Chulo,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=A2swmivN,comment-id=00180000,timestamp=2019-08-27T18:35:28.189+0000)
>
> Hello! I just checked, shows claimed and I do not have the Baron capsule in my loot either.

Hey Poppy and everyone else who experienced this, just checking back once more. Can you check your Loot page on the League Client and/or the Twitch Loot page again. There was a fix pushed out that should've resolved this and it may have taken some time to get through everyone.
Yes, I just checked and I got my capsule! Thanks for your good work!
Same here :/
My page still says claimed as well. No new capsules in inventory either
Same here :(
Same here. Furry capsule but no baron capsule.
i got the wrong capsule too came furry instead of baron capsule {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
Yeah I got a furry capsule and got two 975 shards and an epic shard.
Same here. Got the furry one. I got 2 1375 skins, a 975 one and 100 orange esences :/
I had the same issue here. Got a furry capsule instead

I got furry capsule, any update from riot?
 this seems to be a large 'bug'. 
I hope they fix it and we aren't just left out to dry
Also happened to me , got a furry capsule. Opened it nothing thinking about it being the wrong one, hopefully they can fix this issue.
same here got a furry..
Jep i got the same Problem. I got an 1350 and two 975 and 100 orange Points instead of the permanent legendary :/
I didn't get the rift herald capsule? Why ? I received the first 3 caps but not the last one .
Guys i got my Baron Capsule in my Inventory. Check yours. Ty Riot :)
Same! I also got the wrong one and have not seen the correct one appear yet. :(
Same problem.here i just collected the furry capsule not the baron capsule what should i do now?!!
I have this problem too. It shows my baron capsule is claimed on the Prime Loot page, but I only got the furry capsule yesterday.
Same for me, hope we get the right one soon
Classic Riot
I didn't even receive my capsule! I checked my twitch prime loot, and it says it's claimed. WTHeck
I got the right capsule but I've only gotten 1 skin shard each time I opened the capsules
You only got 1 skin shard? Did you get the emote? Also check your collection, should be a new permanent one.
I had the same problem, sent in a ticket just incase
I didn't check, but I'm pretty sure I got the wrong one because I didn't get a legendary skin.
Same here, got the Furry Capsule instead of Baron, no legendary skin as advertised. Logged a "bug" with riot but haven't heard back yet.
same here
same for me, got a furry capsule. i already opened it but i hope it doesnt matter at all. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Should I have not opened my capsule?
Yup. I got a furry capsule as well. Haven't opened it. Sent in a ticket. We will see what happens I guess.
Yup I just got that too.  Was a Furry capsule from the Cats vs Dogs event and not the Twitch Prime Baron Capsule.
same
